mapper.select: SELECT seq, no, date_format(regDate, '%y.%m.%d') as regDate, title, contents, writer, hit FROM post WHERE delStatus = 0 ORDER BY seq DESC
SELECT seq, no, date_format(regDate, '%y.%m.%d') as regDate, title, contents, writer, hit FROM post WHERE seq = #{seq}
SELECT no FROM post WHERE delStatus = 0 ORDER BY no DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (no, regDate, title, contents, writer, hit) VALUES (#{no}, NOW(), #{title}, #{contents}, '관리자', 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET no = no - 1 WHERE seq > #{seq}
